title: URFUN Kid's Wool Witch Hat Wide Brim Spire Knitted Cap for Halloween Party Decor
features: Material: wool blended knitted fabric, soft, stretchy and breathable material for comfortable fit
One size fits most Kids.Length: 32cm/12.5”, inner diameter: 19cm/7.5”, height: 20cm/7.8”, brim:6.5cm/2.6”. Wide brim
A foldable witch hat which you can fold into the shape you need without worrying about deformation due to storage
Fashion design, unique structure and availabe in six colors: Green,Beige,Blue,Purple,Black,Yellow
Great for blocking the sun, perfect for Halloween, costume party, Christmas, cosplay and other festival occasions as a decoration
description: Wicked witch hat is made of high quality wool, soft texture, breathable and durable. It features foldable pointed cap, wide brim and six colors. A wonderful gift for your friends, family and coworkers. Can be used for Halloween, costume party, carnivals, cosplay and other occasions.
